Class State

java.lang.Object
mastermind.core.State
public class State extends Object
Singleton class representing the state of the Mastermind game.

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static State getInstance()
      Returns the single instance of the State class. This method uses double-checked locking to ensure thread safety of the instance.
      Returns:
      the single instance of the State class
